title: Iain Duncan Smith – 2012 Speech on Reforming Welfare
author: admin
summary: The below speech was made by the Work and Pensions Secretary, Iain Duncan Smith, at the Cambridge Public Policy lecture on 25th October 2012. The speech was titled “Reforming Welfare, Transforming Lives”.

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners

**Beveridge**
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

**Welfare inheritance**
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
